{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Ancestral Temple|It|The Ancestral Temple}} is a sacred site where the people of Natlan once communicated with the [[Night Kingdom]]. In modern times, this temple is no longer in use, as the tribes have established a more stable connection with the Night Kingdom. However, it is still considered "holy ground", and is actively guarded by the [[Scions of the Canopy]]. According to [[Legba]], only "experienced Couriers" who have passed three trials may enter.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|To the Night, What is the Night's}}</ref></p>}}
